alert.note: Alert for Greene (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 12:27AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...Strong winds associated with the leading edge of showers will impact portions of Greene County through 100 AM CST... At 1225 AM CST, emergency management reported strong winds near Springfield. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Springfield... Republic... Battlefield... Willard... Strafford... Ash Grove... Fair Grove... Walnut Grove... Brookline... Sacville... Glidewell... Ebenezer... Bassville... Turners... Bois D`arc... Cave Springs... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 61 and 68, and between mile markers 70 and 90. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
